context: Mid-size SaaS company (150 employees) replacing legacy CRM system with modern platform to support international expansion and improved sales operations

request.purpose: Replace outdated CRM with scalable, AI-powered platform
request.justification: Current system limiting international growth, manual processes costing 15 hours/week per rep

decision_process.outcome: Defined 25 must-have features, 15 nice-to-have features, $800K budget ceiling
Shortlisted 3 vendors: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive based on feature fit and pricing
Salesforce selected for superior AI capabilities and enterprise scalability

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% increase in sales productivity, 40% faster reporting, improved international sales coordination
business_impact.projected_value: $2.1M NPV over 3 years (productivity gains + revenue increase)

lessons_learned: Comprehensive POC testing revealed hidden integration challenges, early user involvement prevented adoption issues, negotiated pricing saved 15% vs initial quotes
